meanings.definition: A young woman who enjoys engaging in carefree and lively activities.
meanings.sent1: The playgirls danced joyfully in the park.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends were known as the playgirls because they loved having fun together.
meanings.sent3: The playgirls giggled as they played tag, their laughter echoing through the playground.
meanings.sent4: The playgirls were like colorful butterflies, flitting from one activity to another.
meanings.sent5: The image of the playgirls skipping merrily stayed with him long after they had gone.

meanings.definition: A group of young women who participate in recreational activities together.
meanings.sent1: The playgirls went hiking in the mountains every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The playgirls organized a picnic by the lake for a day of fun.
meanings.sent3: The playgirls decided to have a dance-off to determine the best dancer among them.
meanings.sent4: The playgirls were a whirlwind of energy, always planning the next adventure.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the playgirls laughing around the campfire was etched in her mind.
